dmca.title: Sveasoft Claims Firmware Under GPL Is Pirated
dmca.body:
Saturday, October 02, 2004 2:09 AM	Sveasoft Inc [private]	p,01


Dear Google;

This email is to inform you of a DMCA copyright violation at the URL http://freewrt.narod.ru. Copies of our copyrighted software are distributed from this URL without authorization by Sveasoft Inc. Repeated email requests to the web site maintainer have not received any response or action. We request that this URL and the offending material be removed from Google's search engine.

On a Google search for our trademark and company name "Sveasoff', this pirate site appears on the first search page returned from Google. We are losing hundreds of customers and significant revenue because of this high placement of this pirate site on the Google search engine.

The following material available from the http://freewrt.narod.ru site is copyright Sveasoft Incorporated and not authorized for distribution.

WRT54G.Sveasoft Firmware.Alchemy.pre5.3_by_wrt54g.streamfire.netzip 
WRT54G_Wolf_W14_Alchemy_5_2_3_by_wrt54g.streamfire.net.zip 
WRT54G_Reformed_B8_Alchemy_5_2_2_ by_wrt54g.streamfire.net.zip 
Firmware_Alchemy-pre5_2_1.bin.zip
Firmware_Alchemy-pre5_1.bin.zip

The web site also uses Google Adsense advertisements as a source of commercial revenue and is thus profiting from the unauthorized distribution of our copyrighted works with Google as the source of these profits.

I state under penalty of perjury that the above is true and correct and that I am the CEO of Sveasoft Inc. and have the right to enforce copyright violations for the company.

As per Google request - "I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law."

Sveasoft Inc. contact information: US Office

Sveasoft Inc.
 [private]	
Stockton, CA 95204 USA

European Office  [private]	
SE-134 63 Ingaro Sweden

Tel. 011- [private]	 

Electronic Signature:

 [private]	

Thanks very much for your help in this,

 [private]	, CEO 
Sveasoft Inc.
